alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clark; Cleveland; Dallas; Grant; Jefferson; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 10:10PM CDT until May 21 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cleveland County in southeastern Arkansas... Southern Clark County in southwestern Arkansas... Grant County in central Arkansas... Northern Calhoun County in southwestern Arkansas... Dallas County in southwestern Arkansas... Ouachita County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1010 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Sheridan to near Carthage to near Beirne, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Camden... Sheridan... Fordyce... Rison... Gurdon... Bearden... Stephens... Leola... Kingsland... Sparkman... Thornton... Carthage... Prattsville... Chidester... Whelen Springs... Beirne... White Oak Lake State Park... Jenkins Ferry State Park... Tipton... Dogwood... This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 53 and 65. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Clark; Cleveland; Dallas; Grant; Jefferson; Ouachita
